messages.text: Happy Birthday, {{name}}! You’re the garland that brightens today 🎊
Hip hip, {{name}}! Party horn on, party hat tilted — let’s go! 🎺🎈
Dear {{name}}, happy birthday — may your day feel warm and kind 💛🕯️
Pop the cork, {{name}} — today we toast to you! 🥂
More wishes, more laughter, more you. Happy birthday, {{name}}! 🎈
Confetti in the air, warmth in your heart — cheers, {{name}}! 🥂🎊
A sweeter day for a sweet you, {{name}} — sprinkles included 🧁✨
Today we celebrate you, {{name}} — perfectly as you are 💛
A slice of cake and a heap of joy for you, {{name}} 🎂
Tooot for {{name}}! Another lap around the sun to celebrate ☀️🎺
Banners up, worries down — enjoy your day, {{name}}! 🎉
To you, {{name}} — to warmth, love and little wonders 🥂✨
Blow softly and wish big, {{name}} — today, everything’s allowed 🎈
Party hat slightly crooked, smile perfectly right — happy birthday, {{name}}! 🥳
Clink! To new chances and gentle days, {{name}} 🍾🥂
Candles lit, wish set — you shine, {{name}} 🕯️🎂
New orbit, fresh sparkle. Happy birthday, {{name}} 💫
